website_summaries.verdict: Despite the low price, this is a reliable headset with good chat audio quality.
pros: The over-ear design does a good job of blocking out external audio, and this headset can be worn for hours without discomfort
The mic is crisp and clear

customer_reviews.title: Good for a budget replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replacement headset for my son. He's happy. Said it's better than his old one. Only issue is they cancel noise pretty well, so my kid can't hear me tell him to take out the trash!
customer_reviews.author: chris fidler

customer_reviews.title: No mute switch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset and it doesn't even have a mute switch... EDIT: You can mute this mic it just doesn't have an actual switch which is annoying to me. But you can mute it, and it works fine other than that.
customer_reviews.author: MadaTheGr8

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best headphone deal I’ve seen so far
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with these headphones. They may not have every little gadget and gizmo that you want, but they have everything that you need: No adapter needed, no battery to worry about, cool little flip-up mic, and you get the same Turtle Beach-quality performance at such a low (and reasonable) price. No complaints. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Wish the box hadn’t been thrown out!
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, mic picks up excellent, and the mute works... BUT it feels like there is a heating element inside both of the headphones after they’ve been on your head for 15 minutes the speakers must have an amplifier inside each muff that’s producing enough heat that it becomes unbearable to wear continuously for over 30-45 minutes. If you’re only planning on using these for really short gaming sessions I’d tell ya to swing it, but I’d love to have my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset.
customer_reviews.text: Works on switch, you have to change the Nintendo Switch default settings to allow the microhone to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Davisson

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Turtle Beach headsets for over 10 years now. I'm an avid gamer and decided to try these on. I bought this for my 7 year old when he plays Forza, Minecraft, and Robloxs. They fit ok, but are super low on volume to me. I might play around with his settings, but the volume is all the way on high and doesn't feel loud at all. Granted I'm using TB XO Seven Pro and Stealth 700 headsets which are totally different than this one. They will be a good gaming headset for him just wish they were a little louder than what they're right now. Thats my only con with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Inc

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a budget to replace my PS4 Gold Series headset. To compare: Pros: the Recon 70 is lighter and more comfortable, doesn't require separate charging (wired to controller) , I prefer its volume control wheel vs PS Gold buttons, flip-to-mute Mic works well and overall sound quality is good. Cons: The sound is not as good as the dynamic surround sound of the PS Gold, and there is no chat volume control like on the PS Gold = if your friends Mic volume is low, you will not be able to hear them very well without asking them to adjust their Mic volume.
customer_reviews.author: Evan T.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headset! Pros: super comfortable, cancels out pretty much any noise in the room, people can hear me over the mic clearly. Cons: I wish the volume would get louder (although the noise canceling does kinda make up for it)
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headset
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headset. Very comfortable on my head, perfect to play for hours. Ear cushions are very comfortable on my ear, and it doesn't make my ears sweat, which is a plus. I like, that the flip-up microphone to mute, gives you a lock position, to know that the mic is muted, other than the Astro A10s where you don't know if the mic is muted. The speakers are really good. So far, I've been playing firestorm (Battle Royale) on Battlefield 5 with these headphones. So far, I played 5 games and won every game. These headphones are built for battle royale. Thanks turtle beach, for making these headphones. You always succeed in satisfying me.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Humberto

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly fine on Nintendo Switch but short cabel
customer_reviews.text: Bought is specifically for my kids to play Fortnite on the Nintendo switch and it works perfect. No issues at all. The cable is very short and that's the only reason I am giving 4 stars, so when they play on the TV they are very close. I bought an extension but with that, the mic for some reason does not work. Otherwise is is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: XBOXONE COMPATIBLE MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome and it’s amazing for gaming on XBOXONE it’s been a month or so since I’ve had these and I freaking love them you can hear all the details in game.
customer_reviews.author: The1Vibez

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good headset. The sound is very clear and crisp, but the bass is pretty weak. Headset doesn’t feel heavy, so that’s good. Material feels cheap compared to a $20 headset I bought before. Update: the mic is pretty good as I used it for the Xbox one, but on the ps4 it makes you sound a bit quiet. Also, even though flipping the mic back and forth to mute and unmute is fun and unique, I still would’ve preferred a normal mute/unmute switch on the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Jurado

customer_reviews.title: Great price to performance ratio
customer_reviews.text: At this price point I was just hoping for some decent sound and the ability to chat with friends while gaming. These achieved that and a little more. They aren’t surround sound but they do provide enough spacial awareness to help you find what direction a sound is coming. I do wish they provided mic feedback. I like to be able to hear my own voice so I’m not yelling while I talk. These feel like I’m talking with earplugs in.
customer_reviews.author: Bricedude

customer_reviews.title: 2 pairs in 3 weeks, both broken, they are crap
customer_reviews.text: Amazon replaced the first headset when it came nonfunctional, the replacement worked for a week and already is crackling and the microphone doesn’t work. The kid literally sits in front of a screen, not moving while playing - yet they don’t work. Use on this headset was 2 total hours over the course of the week, so it’s not like he blew or wore them out.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quit working with no damage after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones in August. In January they started to stutter and then today they completely cut out. I take care of all of my equipment and I am very disappointed that a $40 set of headphones can’t last but 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: James Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: The worst headsets I've ever had in my life, only works 3 days, suddenly one of the speakers stops working, bad purchase, very dissapointed, if were possible i'll give -1 star Buyer beware, I tried to repair these headsets but it is impossible, the materials are made of the worst quality, I bought a Chinese headsets and they works much better than these, I will never buy the turtle beach brand, now they are where they belong, in the trash can
customer_reviews.author: Rhonald Misael Apontes

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous! I bought 1 and it came defective with only the right ear working. It was replaced in a timely manner... But only after a couple of weeks the replacement quit working. Returning for a refund now. For "Turtle Beach" I am EXTREMELY disappointed. I bought my son an off brand on Amazon Months ago and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: George Lynch

customer_reviews.title: defected mic :(
customer_reviews.text: the mic didn’t work at all :( we have a pair of this headset but in blue and everything works perfectly fine so we wanted to give this as a gift to a family member so it’s easier for us to chat while gaming but he opened it to a broken mic. it would spin all the way around instead of going from one angle to another. so we had to return it because there was no point in keeping it. this is very disappointing, i hope it was just mine that was defected.
customer_reviews.author: Areli

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a little over two months ago. They sound good for the price. They mute by moving the mic into the upward position which is convenient in my opinion. The cord is a good length. In the past I kept buying these cheap $20 headphones somewhere else on Amazon and they wouldn't last me more than a few months because they weren't very durable. So far these have been holding up better. I'll be sure to let everyone know if something changes. Edit: We are now 5 months in and they are still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I won't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the cheaper ones I've bought. It works, but not well. I bought a $20 generic gaming headset that lasted so long and was so good until it broke by outside forces. The speakers aren't as loud as my other ones so I keep it on max at all times. The mic barely works, I'm constantly yelling through it. It'll do for listening to music. I will not buy this one again. Maybe I just got a bad one, but it was bad or of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 90 days
customer_reviews.text: The right side earphone stopped working first. Well last night the end piece broke off in my phone. Now I have to get another phone because I can't remove it. Sad thing is I purchased these headphones in June 2020 and the phone in December 2019. Not a happy camper right now. They didn't even last 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: I think these work really well and I don't get complaints from others about echoing etc. The only thing I could see being annoying for someone, is the location of the volume adjuster - It's on the back side of one of the ears so if I'm leaning back on the couch, sometimes I accidentally turn the volume way up/down. Not that big of an issue to me though. To mute, you just turn the mic upwards and it mutes you. I use on Xbox One.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these sound great and the mic works just fine. Only grip would be the top of the head over strap. I have older gaming headphones from a similar price range and the same manufacturer where it has more padding. But they weren't for me, so that person is not complaining and no stars have been taken away as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Really solid headphones, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they're a recognized brand that aren't crazy expensive. They feel comfortable and durable and the sound quality is just fine. I tried a bunch of cheaper headphones with good reviews but they all had things about them that I didn't like. These are a tad more expensive but they're worth it because they have no issues and they feel like they'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Annis

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Garbage...... Straight out of the box everything that came through the headset sounded like a radio station right out of reach. Garbled and cracking. Possibly the ones I received were damaged but wasnt chancing another try. Upgraded to aturtle beach bluetooth set and never looked back. Only good thing is they were only $20 which left me with free money to buy a good pair while waiting on my refund.
customer_reviews.author: IAML3GION

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headset/Mic!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the older version. The flip-up Mic is perfect. It sounds great, no high-highs or low-lows but is clear as a bell to use. I'm an older gamer and find this to be a must-have especially in open-world gaming where you can hear everything around you in surround. I bought two of the older version Turtle beack mic headsets for my kids a few months ago. Wishing i would have seen these, as they are a much better build and do not have a detachable mic. Mic folds up and out of the way while muting itself.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month
customer_reviews.text: Let me start out and say the sound quality is decent and the volume is nice and loud. I like that the mic flips up and for muting. The problem i have is that one of the tiny screws that holds one of the head phones in pulled out. IT will not stay in so the head phones dont sit right on my head and the head phone can over rotate. This i really disappointing since its only a month old. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Haight

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, even more so refurbished apparently.
customer_reviews.text: Showed up non-functional. Also is not advertised there is not a splitter for PC use of the mic. Real disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: kblc5

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable on head and ears sound is good easy adjust on the mike to mute.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson he likes that you just flip the mike up and it mutes it. He says the sound is good he would rate it an 8 out of 10 he says they are comfortable on his head and ears they adjust easily. This is third pair of turtle beach headphones he has had in past year they don’t hold up very well we are hoping this pair will last and not lose sound in one side or the other and the mike stays attached. For now he’s happy with them
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: High-end headset at a low-end price
customer_reviews.text: This Gaming Headset is a great headset for those who are on a budget but are still looking for a reliable headset that still offers great quality and comfort. There are some headsets out there that cost a lot more than this one but unless you’re a professional gamer, I would suggest going with this one as it basically does everything you would expect a headset to do at a much cheaper price. The surround sound really comes in handy when listening for footsteps or shots if you play those types of games because it gives you an idea of where these sounds are coming from in relation to your character’s position.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaBoy89

customer_reviews.title: Good for mundane tasks, too
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I am not a gamer. I bought these because they looked very comfortable and I liked the colors. I needed new headset for work (online meetings, etc), and the normal work headsets are all very boring looking. They are very comfortable and I can hear everything just fine through them. They are pretty good at noise cancelling. The mic is also great, even though it's small and not right in front of my face! I think it's better this way because it doesn't pick up my breathing. Now I have the coolest headset in the office!
customer_reviews.author: Attack HamsterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Crap product delivered
customer_reviews.text: Keeps randomly cutting out for no reason. Totally unusable. One of the worst headsets I've ever owned. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S

customer_reviews.title: Basic Turtle Beach headset
customer_reviews.text: These are priced about $40 USD. And they perform like you would expect a $40 headset. They don't feel very solid in construction, but they have decent sound and the microphone is average. The Amazon warranty on these are about 60 days and mine died completely about 4 months after I received them. You'll be required to email Turtle Beach and they will respond to you in about 4-5 business days. They will do nothing for you over the phone except direct you to email them. I will not be purchasing another Turtle Beach product when they do not offer decent customer support on their products. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Wont work with overwatch
customer_reviews.text: It works on my pc, but wont work for overwatch on switch. I bought this for that sole purpose. Huge dissapointment. Triple checked all settings. My voice never registers. Super frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: M. CARPER

customer_reviews.title: Not wireless but excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I compared the prices for the wireless versus the ones that you can plug into a wireless game controller. These were way cheaper than the wireless and still relatively convenient to use. The sound quality is great depending on your internet speed and connection. Also comfortable enough to use for our eight year old or my husband. Great product for an excellent price. Worth saving the $100 or so compared to the Turtle Beach wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Headphone jack broke off after 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: After the 2nd use, the headphone jack broke off. Very disappointed. Of course the packaging was already tossed when this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just simply stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like it was good quality, worked for about 1 week, them microphone stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: At first it was a good headset.. I bought it for my bf for Christmas and he was very happy with it.. the ear muf part was comfortable and it worked.. but after using it for three months and only on the weekends and not ever weekend he used it when he played it broke, randomly. He can hear everyone else but they can’t hear him .. sadly I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Emily zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: The sounds quality is I very good for a non-powered headset. They are easily adjusted for fit. I wish the ear covers we're a bit bigger, but they are comfortable. They are light weight for longer periods of gaming. The only negatives are the cord and jack. The cord is plastic rather than more flexible nylon and the jack would be better if it were a 90 degree jack rather than a straight jack.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price that paid for them at the time was $25. They are not that bad. They only issue that I have is that they feel very flimsy. When I go to use them, I try to be as careful as possible because I feel like they're going to break with the slightest wrong movement. Other than that, sound quality is not that bad for the price again. As for the comfortability of the headset is concerned if you have a big head, it might feel a little awkward because it seems like there made for kids up to maybe older teens. I hope that helps anyone when it comes to making a decision to purchase the headsets.
customer_reviews.author: No OnE MaJoR

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for your gamer
customer_reviews.text: My son paid for this with his own money because he didn’t want to share his brother’s headphones. He said these are better than his brother’s pricey ones. The microphone mutes when you push it up and the sound quality is good. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: GibblerWho

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one round of pubg and then started to cut out.
customer_reviews.text: It failed within 30 mins. Thought it might be the controller but after getting a new controller and then a different head set, it turns out the cord had a short at the jack. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Decent headset
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Small microphone so they can not hear background noise and breathing. Small cord which makes it easy to game without it getting tangled around your leg or your arms. Very comfortable. Cons - Broke within a week of purchase, could not hear in-game / party audio. I wouldn't say it "broke" I would say it stopped working. If you ever buy this you would want to get a warranty with it. Overall amazing headset by turtle beach, but last time I am buying from them.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 weeks. Waiting for replacement.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 4.29.20 A replacement has the same issue and stopped working. Poor quality with cord connectivity. ============ My boyfriend loved it at first but unfortunately, it stopped working after weeks. Didn’t give up yet. Waiting for a replacement to see if it lasts this time. I’ll update my review later on.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.... at first.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Blocks out the noise so you can focus on the game or watch tv quietly when everyone is asleep. Update: bought this headset on July 2, 2019 and today, November 6, 2019 the microphone went out. Sound still works ok so I can still use the headset to watch shows when everyone else is asleep but I’m bummed I now have to buy a new headset to game with.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Carmona

customer_reviews.title: I hear it now
customer_reviews.text: I purchase 2 headsets for a Christmas gift. Initially When attempting to use it, I didn’t hear anything audio. After calling turtle and Xbox tech support, I found that I had to update the software to my controllers, completely turn down the volume down on my television and turn up “audio” on my Xbox. Now I can hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanspices

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, style, and sound
customer_reviews.text: This headset is perfect for my large head, and glasses! It is comfortable to wear for hours! I use this pair with my Nintendo switch, as there isn't a good way to use a wireless set. The flip to mute mic is a great feature! If your head is large (xxl hats), and you wear glasses, have no fear! These will do wonderfully! My only con is that the mic isn't as loud as other models, my friends have had to adjust their audio to hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Raging45

customer_reviews.title: Worked less than a month... :(  How do we get support under warranty?
customer_reviews.text: This headset worked less than a month, and then the sound went in and out as if there is a short in it. They were gently and lightly used so no trauma. Just... Boom, one day it started going in and out. Would not purchase again for sure. I suppose that's why they are so cheap. Bought HyperX to replace.... I've had another pair of them that have lasted for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marrero

customer_reviews.title: Awful pair of headphones!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I noticed sound was very quiet when I received the headphones, but I soon adjusted and got used to it. About 3 months after I started using the headphones, sound cut out completely. Tried all troubleshooting options, then finally contacted turtle beach. Their customer service was good but I can't say the same for their headphones. They sent me a new headset and I was happy, that is until they also broke, the same issue as before, and this was only two weeks after I got the headset! Very disappointed in product quality all around and will be finding a new company to buy headphones from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to be let down
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Turtle beach makes terrible quality headphones. They seem nice out of the box but both my sets I’ve bought have broken within 4 months. Cosmetically they’re fine but functionally they are cheaply built and your audio will lose function without reason. Hoped I was buying into a reputable company that I would get quality but at this point I cannot by any means give my endorsement for any product they make
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Turtle Beach headset I've owned and like the others, it quit working after a week or two. No sound on headphones. Returned and won't buy the brand again. Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Tangled Hearts

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son loves the headphones. The quality is great for the price paid. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna, Covington LA

customer_reviews.title: These stink
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about video games or their accessories, being a dorky 50 year old lady who knits. I purchased these for my 15 year old boy, who has informed me that they are crap. They short out constantly and have poor quality when not shorting out. He neglected to tell me this in time to return them. They are the hot potato headset, ie., the last disgruntled teen gamer to grab a headset gets stuck with them. But I’m ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lopy

customer_reviews.title: Started off good
customer_reviews.text: They started off as a great headset with for the price has some good sound quality. Foot steps playing call of duty and etc. But.... now a few months later with regular use no abuse they have become shorted out. Sound in either ear or non, I have to play with the volume button to get the sound to work or at least play in one ear. Now I know there cheap but still could have lasted more than 3 months. That’s like a 10$ a month subscription
customer_reviews.author: Kolton d doucet

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my brother for Xmas. By the time I got home from Xmas and got on Xbox, my brother was on testing out his headphones. The damn microphone didn’t work. He could hear me fine through them but couldn’t get the mic to work at all. Ended up returning. Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Good value, work well
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Sound is pretty good. Mic seems to work well. I like that it mutes when i move the mic out of the way. I’m 6’4” 240lbs. My head is larger then average and they’re comfortable. My 10 year old also uses them regularly and he says they’re comfy too so that’s pretty impressive. My ears do get warm sometimes wearing them, but I think that’s to be expected with this style.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Well I've had them two months...
customer_reviews.text: Well... I've had these for two months now and at first they were good. But after having them for a bit when i scroll the volume button up to "full volume" the hearing on the right side stops working... Then you have to sit there and mess with the little wheel either until you make the hearing come back or you lower it low enough so it comes back, super lame. Its frustrating especially for only being 2 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Kori cirino

customer_reviews.title: The cord is thin and breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: The head phones were nice good clear sound. But the cord was broke in MN less than a month
customer_reviews.author: granny

customer_reviews.title: great headset
customer_reviews.text: The best feature is the flip up mic, which is mute when it is up. That helps a lot. Other than that it is just a basic headset. It looks a bit weird, too wide on the head. But it is comfortable. You hear good sound, but the mic picks up quite a bit of surrounding sound. Overall it is a good one for the features it provides, but could use some improvement with better features.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Kec

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work the microphone in Fortnite in the switch
customer_reviews.text: The microphone didn’t work in my nintendo switch with Fortnite
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Rizzi

customer_reviews.title: Very high Quality. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a very low cost headphone set and this is definitely built towards gaming. The sound quality is great! As well as my friends who say the mic is crystal clear. This is no pro headset (as in ones Ninja or Bugha would wear) but these would ne my first choice to buy headphones. As well as all that again, it's made of mostly plastic but it is very durable. At first when you get the package it feels like nothing is in it but trust me there will be! This headset is surround sound and noice cancelling. I have nothing to say bad about this product. You should definitely buy.
customer_reviews.author: TEANNA HALL

customer_reviews.title: Customer service seems to be non  existent
customer_reviews.text: The 3.5mm jack fit a little tight in my Xbox controller. Went to take it out and it was stuck. Tried wiggling it out and it broke off. So headphones broke less then a week in and now the 3.5mm jack on my xbox controller doesn't work, even after I got the broken piece out. Contacted CS on 4/22 and haven't heard a word other than an automated response.
customer_reviews.author: TFournier

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Trash Company. Do not trust. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 months of use, my cord frayed and it is not working. I have tried twice to contact Turtle Beach as the product should still be under warranty. They asked me to send pics, which I did and so far I have gotten no response. This has been going on for two months. I was a loyal fan and always recommended them. But I will never do this again. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Durable!!
customer_reviews.text: Turtle Beach Recon 70 Gaming Headset - purchased for 14 year old son. I didn’t get the more expensive ones. This version is perfect! Only complaint- They are noise canceling so now when I yell upstairs for my son he can’t hear me, so I purchased an echo dot for his room. It’s the only way I can get his attention lol! Purchased a month ago and they’re still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 10 and 12 yr old boys for Xbox one. They are much better than the older turtle beach headsets we had that had detachable mics. These are clear, sound good and work well. I bought one of each color. I originally bought mine when they first came out. I still use them to this day. I bought these for my boys since the price is less than half what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Rockies

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation works better than I would like. I can have a complete conversation with my husband and if he is wearing the headphones he might never know. I thought it was selective hearing until the same thing happened to me. They are comfortable and don't apply too much pressure to my head
customer_reviews.author: Momofboys

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Beach is Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have owned several Turtle Beach headsets over the years and they’ve always been top quality. My son used his birthday gift card to buy these, and so far he’s been happy with them as well. The sound quality is great, and as a parent I really like that the mic is shorter so it’s not constantly getting spit and crumbs all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jane

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: These are low quality headphones there is hardly any bass to them.
customer_reviews.author: GMAN70

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift for a gamer
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves them they were his Christmas gift and he already opened them he couldn’t wait. He’s so excited the box said Xbox one but they’re for PlayStation as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Elliott

customer_reviews.title: mic problems
customer_reviews.text: the microphone isnt working properly ... I am getting a replacement sent to me
customer_reviews.author: MelKyperIII

customer_reviews.title: Headset Lasted 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: This headset was great until it wasn't. After having it for two months the microphone detached from the headset while I had it on my head & was playing a game. I can hear some sort of screw rattling around inside the ear phone, but can't get to it. The microphone still works when I duct tape it in place, but now I cannot mute myself unless I unplug the headset from my controller. These are not worth the $40 price tag given they only last a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S

customer_reviews.title: Don't work well for xbox
customer_reviews.text: Works great for his PS3 and tablet; but when he tries to use it with his xbox, his friends can't hear him talking. I'm gonna have to buy him another one to use with xbox since that's his main platform
customer_reviews.author: DavinaW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT AUDIO!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset, it has ZERO outside noised or muffled noises, The audio sounds so real that you feel as if you are in a VR or really there. Microphone it GREAT TO! My friends can finally hear me without me sounding muffled! One small complaint, is that it needs to come with a pc adaptor for a desktop. OVERALL, AMAZING AND WORTH THE MONEY! I really do recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sue LeJeune

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: There was no audio no matter how much we checked the settings on both the game and headset.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: better than most headsets.
customer_reviews.text: this product is great for gaming, my last one broke like a snap of a finger, I like the sound of the headset, I also like the cushion of the headset. I don't like the fact it has no mute button but all in all its amazing. I love turtle beaches work and I hope they keep improving.
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a quick satisfying gaming session, but not for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, these headphones are great. Look good and feel good. However, they don't last very long. We bought this set in December and the mic is already not working. If you're ok with spending this amount of money for a short period before buying another set, then they are good. Otherwise I wouldn't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: A great choice for listening to whatever you need to
customer_reviews.text: Along with an appealing look, these headphones fit great and can be adjusted easily. The sound quality is great. It blocks out outside noise. They have a microphone that works well. It has a separate adjustment for volume. The price is great for what you get. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewB5678

customer_reviews.title: Annoying volume/headphone speaker cutout issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic "you get what you paid for" product. Pros: Mic pick up is good, fairly comfortable, durable construction Cons: Bad audio control. The volume dial seems to cause one or the other headphone to just stop emitting sound. The 2 star review, and why I won't recommend this headset, is due to the constant need to adjust the volume just to make both headphones work. It's VERY distracting to be messing with the volume dial during my gaming sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Blake

customer_reviews.title: What is this a headset for ants??
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound quality, clear and good mic, and seems to have a decent build quality. The big issue is that these are very, very small. I have a bigger than average sized head (but not Tito Ortiz-eque or anything), and couldn't wear these for more than 5 minutes without sharp pain in my ears. They're sized for a smaller adult or even a big child for sure. Bummed because I've heard good thing about Turtle Beach, but obviously from my tiny eared friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Comfort could be better, but sound quality and voice clarity is good. Haven't tried on PUBG or anything, so not sure how good it is with footsteps, but I bought for my wife so we could play and talk while I'm away and she loves it. I used it when I came home but it's a little snug on the ears for me, but she says it's great for her.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Perty darn good.
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. Nice clear sound. Very comfortable over long periods (multiple hours at a time). These plug directly into, and are powered by, the xbox-one controller, so your batteries will run dry slightly faster. I would like a little more low-end in the sound quality, but i can be rather picky with that sort of thing. Over-all, the sound it great for gaming. For the price, i think youd be hard pressed to find anything better.
customer_reviews.author: A. HELLfire

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased this for my son, it worked for six months. Microphone crapped out, I don't know why these headphones keep breaking. Poorly made products these days. We live in a disposable society.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello Puleo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design and Price but Very Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality isn’t great. When you adjust the volume knob, the sound goes in and out. I like the microphone functionality but the sound quality issues greatly outweigh the low price. Spend an extra $10. The no name Chinese brands are higher quality. Hurts me to say that.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. It worked for a few days and now the mic is not working. We can only hear other people through the headset but cannot hear myself talk nor can anyone hear me. I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for PS4 and works great for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Turtle Beach Recon 70 Gaming Headset for PS4 and I love it. It's a great price, they work great and are comfortable. My favorite feature is being able to push the mic upwards to mute without having to push a button or unplug the headset from the controller.
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Mic works intermittently. Mute switch doesn’t work at all. Required multiple resetting of system to get to work. Better options available for similar price.
customer_reviews.author: eoddavid

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality - the mic stops working after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: We tried purchasing this twice....refunded the 1st pair thinking it was just a glitch with the microphone. My son was able to hear but his mic would not work. We purchased a 2nd pair and the same thing happened after a few weeks. We tried messing with the settings, using a different, controller, etc. but nothing worked. Unfortunately the return window had already closed by the time we went to return the 2nd pair so we are unable to get our money back. TL;DR: It works for about a few weeks, but then the microphone stops working. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Silance

customer_reviews.title: Will not last longer than 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I caution anyone against buying this product. If my return window hadn't closed then I would return these headphones. I am a casual gamer, and have used this product at most 5 hours a week since I bought them in late May. They have begun crackling, cutting out sound and distorting my audio experience so severely that I cannot use them anymore. From what I have gathered from my friends and online reviews, Turtle Beach has nice high-end products but it was a mistake to buy their low-end headphones. I will sadly have to buy another set of headphones, from a different company, as these are no longer functioning anywhere near sufficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent
customer_reviews.text: These are great and not expensive. Bought them for my husband and they say playstation but they also work for xbox consoles as well. It says it on the back. Hearing is great. Microphone works great. And they cancel alot of noise from the surrounding enviroment as well or my husband is just ignoring me.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa mckee

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This headset is absolutely worth it for the price. The overall sound quality isn't as good as the upper models, as it houses 40 MM drivers as opposed to 50, but they provide plenty of bass and a great balance of mid and high range. The best way to test them is to listen to music on them, as the 3.5 MM cord plugs into your phone the same way it does for your controller.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P

customer_reviews.title: good for the price but lasted only 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 6 months ago and it was a good headset for the price. The mic was pretty good and the noise cancelling sound was good quality as well. But, recently (for about a month now) the mic has been malfunctioning and my voice has been coming through super quietly. My friends has to adjust my volume and turn my voice super loudly for them to be able to hear me...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Corsmeier

customer_reviews.title: Volume wheel cuts left side and mic out.
customer_reviews.text: if you use the volume wheel the left speaker and the mic cut out until you find a sweet spot and leave it. The mic also cuts out when folding it out of the way, even touching the mic can make it cut out. The headset works, but just barely. Suggestion, buy a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: If your using for PC you must have a splitter.
customer_reviews.text: Annoying that nowhere did it say that they required a headphone splitter in order to be PC compatible until you open the box. Only has a single cord that is good for audio if your using a PC.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Nall

customer_reviews.title: Not that good.
customer_reviews.text: Mic is too short. You’re basically yelling in party chat because people can’t hear you. Not good for late night games or times where you don’t want to be talking loud.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a few months
customer_reviews.text: Don’t recommend. Bought these at Christmas time for my son who’s 10. He’s only aloud an 1 hr/school day and 8 hrs/weekends to play his xbox, so I don’t see how these went out so quickly. Bless his heart, he tried getting them to work but it was a no go.
customer_reviews.author: love2bhappy2

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of white base with black and blue accents, had the recon 50p before this in black with blue accents wasn’t bad but this is a change up, also not sure what people are saying with the headset cutting out during games like cod and battlefield bc I have played both and they work perfect. For a 40$ headset this is bomb and I don’t think I’ll need to ever waste 100$ on a headset!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Olson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas. He loves them. The rest of us not as much. These headphones are so good he literally screams while playing now and has no idea how loud he is. He can’t hear anything besides his game while playing. Great product for gaming. Annoying for the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Dovemama22

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: We wanted headphones that had the mute ability when flipped up, for gaming mostly, but these are actually working really well with live streaming online school that we are using now too. Perfect for quickly muting the headphones. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: utemom

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: These work great and feel good while wearing. Perfect for gaming. Also using them for conference calls, after a few hours of wearing them they do start to rub against the top of your head, but I don't think they were made to be worn for 6+ hours straight.
customer_reviews.author: Jake N.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even work!
customer_reviews.text: Just took it out of the box and The right side has no sound when I’m messing with audio in settings, when in gameplay no sound comes through at all on both sides. What kind of product is this? Give me my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

product_meta.title: Turtle Beach Recon 70 Gaming Headset for PlayStation 4 Pro, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PC, and Mobile - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description:
Color:Black/Blue

Built for your next Victory Royale, your latest achievement and much more with the Turtle Beach Recon 70 gaming headset for PS4 Pro and PS4. Featuring Turtle Beach's latest lightweight and comfortable headset design for hours of play, with high quality 40mm speakers and over ear premium synthetic leather cushions that let you hear every crisp high and thundering low while blocking noise. Turtle Beach's renowned high sensitivity mic to ensure you are heard clearly and easily flips up to mute. Finally, the versatile 3.5mm connection makes it perfect for swapping between PS4 and Xbox One controllers, Nintendo Switch as well as PC and compatible mobile devices

DDR4 RAM: Up to 32GB of DDR4-3200 RAM, everything from gaming to multitasking gets a speed and performance boost.
feature_bullets: Surround sound ready: Optimized for Windows Sonic; Windows Sonic by Microsoft for Xbox One and compatible Windows 10 PCs; Also compatible with Dolby Atmos (additional purchase may be required)
High quality 40 millimeter speakers: Superior 40 millimeter over ear speakers produce crisp highs and thundering lows
Multiplatform compatibility: Designed for Xbox One and works great with PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, PC, and mobile devices
Lightweight comfort: A lightweight design ensures complete comfort during those hours long gaming sessions
Premium ear cushions: Synthetic leather wrapped ear cushions provide added comfort, improved bass response and better noise isolation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars11,672 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
